Our mission is to create dremers who excel in life.

 Dremboard is a social media site founded in January 2014 by Raymond Freeman III and Reco L. Dixon. The site allows dremers to express their drems and inspirations through drems, memories, dremboards, and beautiful slideshows.

 Our users are our “dremers” and they can post pictures called “drems” or videos called “memories.” Drems can then be organized into “dremboards.”

 Dremers can connect with family and friends and post any drem that they find on the web. No matter what no matter what the interest, if you are a dremer then you have discovered a place to share, create, and gather inspiration.

 Drem it, Believe it, Achieve it.
 
 We welcome your feedback.
Email us anytime at CustomerService@dremboard.com
